documents.document: This is a joy to watch the now man! Run out of superlatives for this team, buzzing for the next game 🍀🍀
RT @huddleboard: The hashtag #ThanksCelticFans completely destroys the notion that flying a flag has no effect whatsoever.
Scott Brown was fucking colossal tonight man
Apart from 2 minutes of utter madness, that was about as good as it could get that
Aw fuck me man, what a carryon. Watching that in 30 degrees heat is not ideal 🙈🙈🙈
That's the Celtic team of last year that. What the fuck is going on?
What a fucking half!!! Nothing stupid in the 2nd half and we've got a foot in group stages
Yasssssssssssssssss

Is there anything more roasting hoat than Celtic & Rangers fans arguing on social media?
Some viewing that was 🙈
Outstanding night tonight. @nicfanciulli was superb 👏
@GaryLineker 👏👏👏👏
😂😂😂😂. Fuck sake https://t.co/o13DsE74RQ
Can almost hear the collective 'aw fuck off Newcastle' all the way from Spain when that goal went in 😂
The only thing better than sitting with a beer watching the scores is sitting in 30 degree heat with a beer watching the scores 👌
I'll say one thing, that Rangers team are shite. They need at least 4 players to challenge us
The @Carl_Cox @essentialmix 🙌🙌🙌. One of the best so far this year!
Bastard 😂, thought it had Huns all over it
1 of our first choice back 4 playing, our 40 goal striker and our most talented player out...And he still wants more signings 🙈🙈🙈
Been a long time since I've been so excited about Celtic, this is superb to watch
What a player we've got here, class above everyone on that pitch tonight
Trying to buy tickets for @nicfanciulli in Mallorca on Sunday and I've went and bought tickets only Spanish folk are allowed to buy 😂😂
Got a spare ticket for the Celtic game on Saturday if anybody wants it
@chrislammie what a difference to having Ambrose there 😂. Two signings made the difference
@chrislammie never put a foot wrong. Solid
Yasssssssssssss!!!!! Get it up you's ya hun bastards
What a fucking joke. I despise they Edinburgh hun cunts. About time they went bust again and fucked off into oblivion
'Honest mistake'
Fucking raging
That's one of the worst decisions I've ever seen. Cheating Hun bastard
@Ryanstevenson67 sell johansen, loan Henderson and that leave us with 4/5 CMs. Plenty room for 2 more in and 2 who are better than we have
There are so many positives about signing Scott Sinclair. He'll be an absolute star for us. Now for 2 midfielders and we're laughing
Will miss the home leg though, shite
That's a good draw. Could have been much worse
24 years old and I'm sitting here nervous about a champions league qualifying draw. Fuck you Celtic
@lewcarmichael if I attempt to drink in the pub all day I'll be hame by 7 o'clock, not a bean to my name 😂
No been this skint in fucking years, fuck knows how I'll be affording a galaday this Saturday 🙈🙈
NFL has been fantastic these first few weeks of the season!
How's your Sunday? 😏 https://t.co/Frw9h2hVVN
@chrislammie hopefully we at least give them a scare and get the crowd right into it. You going up tae Dundee next week aye?
@chrislammie first team to beat City this season is the kind a thing we'd pull out a nowhere 🙈
@chrislammie we'll get pumped mate let's be honest 😂
@chrislammie nae sweat. 3-1

Great goal! Kieran Tierney 👏👏

@jimbeek @Ryanstevenson67 😂😂, fuck up
